actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to engage in feasibility investigation of certain potential water resource developments.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to engage in feasibility investigation of potential water resource developments at the Moorhead unit, Powder Division, Pick Sloan Missouri Basin Program, in Montana and Wyoming.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to engage in feasibility investigation of certain potential water resource developments.
